body: This was wholesome actually and gentle.  I'm guessing in this little extra chapter those two guys was the bad one, they even had the kid tied.

The most manipulative one of them by far, always wondered what her kink was. The pigtail was a connoisseur, the "leader" likes those with strong mana or combat ability, and this one was usually either forcefully dominating or pretending to rescue only to reveal their nature...guess she's into being a big sister.
It have a more tender side than i thought.
